title: shrInivAsAya
sahitya:
shrInivAsAya vEda vidita vishva rUpAya shrta janAnanda dAyakAya mangaLam


caraNam 1    venkaTEshAya sankaTAgha mOcanAya vara shashAnka kOTi sundarAya subhra mangaLam
    caraNam 2    sarva gAyaka priyAya sarvamatA mOdakAya sarva bhuvana janahitAya sarva mangaLam
    caraNam 3    mangaLam pallivamsha jAta bAlamuraLikrSNa madhuragAna mOhitAya mahita mangaLam
